edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate

Class GaussianWeights

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.GaussianWeights

  • public class GaussianWeights
extends java.lang.Object
    Structure to store weights for all gaussians in AM. Supposed to provide faster access in case of large models
